transArray.content: The front desk staff are highly qualified and patient. I will choose her place next time. The most heartwarming thing is that you can eat oranges as you like. Hahaha. 100% praise. After the takeout is delivered to the lobby, a robot is responsible for delivering it to the room. It’s great. Like/:strong

Dear guests: Hello! Thank you for staying at Orange Beijing Wukesong Hotel. The hotel is located in the business district. Such a location provides guests with great convenience for eating, accommodation, travel, entertainment and shopping. I am very happy to see your recognition of the hotel staff’s service. Your pleasant stay is a great encouragement to us. All the staff of Orange Beijing Wukesong Hotel look forward to your next stay, thank you! General Manager: Ren Yuanyuan
